attributes.action: Petition for Free School Meals and Milk for All Children
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, call on the UK Government to provide free school meals and milk for all children in primary and secondary schools. No child should go hungry or struggle to concentrate because they cannot afford a meal. Universal free school meals would improve children’s health, education, and well-being while helping families with the rising cost of living.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call on the UK Government to provide free school meals and milk for all children in primary and secondary schools. No child should go hungry or struggle to concentrate because they cannot afford a meal. Universal free school meals would improve children’s health

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Provide free school meals to all school children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/703256
